channel.title: ~~Nova Excision~~ custom Quests/Minigames/auto-donations/vote4rewards/highscores
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/ndsMuw8.png[/img][/CENTER]
[center] [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/tzrr4meiysfglwy/Nova-Excision.jar?dl=1]Play Now![/url] [url=http://www.nova-excision.com/highscores]Highscores[/url] [url=http://nova-excision.com]Website/Forums[/url] [url=http://nova-excision.com/index.php?/topic/97-update-july-12-2015-new-minigame/][size=18pt]Latest update here![/size][/url] [/center]
Introduction: Hello everyone, I am the owner of Nova Excision, I have recently started practicing Java in my high school classes about half a year ago, and learned a lot. I am still continuing to learn as this is my first private server, but I am proud to say I have worked more then 2 months on this server so it's not some copied crap. I also encourage you to check out my server, and try it out. :)
[center][size=24pt]Features[/size][/center] [center] Boss Pets Donator scrolls tradeable among players! Fully working Dicing [b]Our own custom minigame![/b] All npc animations/gfx work in combat Fixed LOTS of dupes! :) Flawless slayer task system with awesome shop! [b]Our own custom Quest with a quest points system![/b] Help chat for everyone! :) Working highscores with hall of heroes feature working Friendly players 200m Capes with particles![/center]
[center][size=24pt]Media:[/size][/center] [center] [img]http://i.imgur.com/WjT28Mz.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/WST4gS7.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ELSFCUR.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ES2559Q.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/KpvWpyH.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/23rwP16.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/bfT6nP3.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/WI6b6wG.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/r1d0c0K.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/hqH49lY.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/m6VBXhk.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=24pt]Future updates in store:[/size][/center] [center] A custom quest made by us: World of the Wyrm [/center]

item.title: ~~Nova Excision~~ custom Quests/Minigames/auto-donations/vote4rewards/highscores
item.dc:creator: @novadude8347 novadude8347
item.description:
@novadude8347 wrote:

[quote=“goudont, post:44, topic:552039”]I don’t like that “first time posters” or other users bump your thread with same general things that the previous comments say. That may cause a predicament. The server does look intricate though, good on you. Stay dedicated; this server is definitely going places. I don’t usually post comments on server advertisement threads but this caught my eye. Know it’s great.

Best of luck to you.[/quote]

I appreciate your comment, thanks for reading my server’s advertisement thread, and taking the time to comment. It does mean something to me. Check it out if you’re ever bored.

Updates:
Curse of Korasi Quest
Custom Partyhats pulled from Mystery Cracker: (Pink, black, cyan, etc)

Read full topic

Items on death are now safe from Corporeal Beast

item.title: ~~Nova Excision~~ custom Quests/Minigames/auto-donations/vote4rewards/highscores
item.dc:creator: @novadude8347 novadude8347
item.description:
@novadude8347 wrote:

killa kronic:

Holy crap… This server is just amazing… :eek: :eek: I’m shocked because some servers don’t even receive quest updates. This can soon be a very big server and will easily complete against the top servers in google or mopar. I’m sorry but 10/10 this server is just wow. Good luck though. I haven’t played it yet and I am excited to play it soon but I am busy.

Thank you, let me know your username when you join. We also plan on adding even more quests depending on the feedback from our players on the latest one, but haven’t got any bad feedback yet.

Other updates: New home (Not a big update, but necessary to hopefully appeal to new players)

Read full topic

item.title: ~~Nova Excision~~ custom Quests/Minigames/auto-donations/vote4rewards/highscores
item.dc:creator: @NovaExcision NovaExcision
item.description:
@NovaExcision wrote:

Today, we have released the first master quest World of the Wyrm.

ZGUHcov.jpg1425×747

It took me about a good 11 days to make this whole quest from nothing, which is quiet an amount of time, and also I took the liberty of adding a quest points system along with quest log for those wanting quests in the future. You can find your quest log in your task’s tab. To get your progress on this quest you can get a World of the Wyrm quest scroll in the general store. Also credits to Torva & Goomy adding the actual Shadow Styrkewyrm along with creating lots of custom npcs.

The requirements for completion of this quest are:
79 Magic
85 Crafting
75 Runecrafting
97 Slayer

Future updates:
Lots of changes for donators and free players
Bug fixes
Possibility of a new home as I keep getting comments on how its too dark
New starter cutscene that will show new players where things are in this game

Read full topic
